IESFY.summary: InterconexiÃ³n ElÃ©ctrica S.A. E.S.P. engages in the linear infrastructure management activities. The company operates and maintains 41,885 kilometers (km) of high voltage circuits and 80,815 MVA of transformation capacity in Colombia, Peru, Bolivia, Brazil, and Chile; international interconnections between Venezuela and Colombia, Colombia and Ecuador, and Ecuador and Peru; and 5,000 km of circuits and 11,000 MVA of transformation in Brazil. It also structures, designs, constructs, operates, and maintains road infrastructure; and provides connectivity infrastructures and telecommunication solutions, as well as manages approximately 25,465 km fiber optics network in Venezuela, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Chile, Argentina, and Brazil. In addition, the company is involved in the planning, design, optimization, commissioning, operation, and management activities for transactional systems or technological platforms that involve value added information exchange, and goods and services related markets.
